situation: A was using a text-to-speech app on a tablet during a group reading session when the app suddenly crashed. A became visibly upset and threw the tablet on the floor.
action: The teacher aide attempted to start a conversation with A about the importance of taking care of school property, ignoring the immediate emotional distress A was experiencing. The aid then promised to fix the tablet by the end of the day but didn’t offer a short-term solution or any reassurance.
effect: A remained upset and disengaged from the session, feeling frustrated about not being able to participate in real-time. The group reading activity continued without her, which increased her feelings of exclusion.
